application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a single storey rear infill extension and rear roof dormer with two front roof windows to the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (TS2021/22, Design & access statement Received: 08/11/2021; TS2021/22 -01, TS2021/22 -02, TS2021/22 -03, TS2021/22 -04, TS2021/22 -05, TS2021/22 -06 Received: 24/11/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
